TidyUI.moduleSettingsActive.name: 始終啓用Mod設定標籤.
TidyUI.moduleSettingsActive.hint: 如果您會經常訪問Modules設定，則可能需要勾選此項，而不必點擊啓用Modules設定標籤.

TidyUI.hideDisableAll.name: 隱藏「禁用所有模塊」的按鈕。
TidyUI.hideDisableAll.hint: 如果要隱藏「保存」按鈕旁邊的「禁用所有模塊」，請勾選此項。

TidyUI.uncheckAll: 取消勾選除Tidy UI以外的所有Modules
TidyUI.export: 滙出所有啓用中的Modules列表
TidyUI.notice: Modules列表已複製到剪貼板 - 請記得保存!
TidyUI.paste: 將您儲存了的Modules列表粘貼到這裡!
TidyUI.instruction: In order to reimport your modules list you have to download the JSON file. Copy as text is only good for posting to Discord or alike. If you have saves in old text format it will still be recognized when you want to restore it.
